abstract: Saudi Arabia announces that King Salman will visit White House for first time since ascending to throne in January; State Dept only tacitly confirms meeting, in which Saudi leader will seek reassurances from United States on Iran nuclear accord.
lead_paragraph: King Salman will visit the White House next week for the first time since ascending to the throne, Saudi officials said.

headline.main: Saudi Arabia: King Plans to Visit U.S.
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Saudi Arabia: King Plans to Visit U.S.

snippet: King Salman will visit the White House next week for the first time since ascending to the throne, Saudi officials said.
